name: The Midas Touch (Marty)
description:
In this fantasy, 2D platformer shooter, play as King Midas, who has the power to turn anything into gold! Use your abilities to interact with the world, solve platforming puzzles, and help (or hinder) various fairy tale creatures!

Controls:

  • Move: a/d or arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Aim: Mouse cursor
  • Shoot: Left click / ctrl
  • Special: Right click / alt

Created during the Virginia Tech Game Project Fall 2019 Game Jam (theme: Golden age).

Credits:

  • Marty Hanapole (Programming, Design)
  • Sophia Dilandro (Art, Design)
  • Adam Prys (Programming, Design)
  • Claire Holmes (UI, Design)
  • Eric Abradu-Otoo (Programming, Level Design)
